item.title: 贝莱德预计，尽管存在风险，人工智能将在 2026 年继续主导市场
item.description: 全球最大的资产管理公司贝莱德（BlackRock）预计，人工智能将在 2026 年继续主导市场，并预计投资者将经历一段动荡的旅程，因为投机性交易和杠杆作用增加了上个月暴跌重演的风险。【原文：BlackRock, the world's largest asset manager, expects AI to continue dominating markets in 2026 and anticipates a turbulent ride for investors as speculative trading and leverage raise the risks of a repeat of last month's sharp selloff.】

item.title: 解说员：特朗普账户 "能否增加低收入美国人的储蓄？
item.description: 特朗普账户 "能否帮助低收入美国人积累财富？【原文：Will "Trump Accounts" help lower-income Americans build wealth?】

item.title: 人工智能淡香水：亚马逊为技术人员提供软件香水
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）周三展示了其 SageMaker 人工智能服务的新功能，称这将帮助客户加快定制人工智能软件模型的速度。【原文：Amazon.com on Wednesday touted new capabilities for its SageMaker AI service that it says will help customers expedite customizing their artificial intelligence software models.】

item.title: 马克-库班寻求特朗普支持减免药费以刺激仿制药生产
item.description: 亿万富翁马克-库班（Mark Cuban）周三告诉路透社，他已敦促特朗普政府免除仿制药审批所需的数十万美元监管费用。【原文：Billionaire Mark Cuban has urged the Trump administration to waive the hundreds of thousands of dollars in regulatory fees required for generic drug approvals, he told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 受迪拜巧克力热潮的推动，阿根廷将赌注押在开心果上
item.description: 在阿根廷快速发展的开心果中心地带，一排排树上结满了成熟的黄色果实，点缀着干燥的大地，这表明这个农业地区正在努力利用其有利的气候条件，以满足全世界对这种坚果的需求。【原文：In Argentina’s rapidly growing pistachio heartland, rows of trees bearing the ripening yellow fruit dot the dry landscape, a sign of how this agricultural region is striving to capitalize on its favorable climate to cash in on worldwide demand for the nut, which has been driven by the popularity of pistachio-filled Dubai chocolate.】

item.title: 台湾联电与 Polar 签订协议，探讨在美国生产 8 英寸芯片
item.description: 台湾芯片制造商联华电子公司（UMC）周四表示，已与美国极地半导体公司（Polar Semiconductor）签署谅解备忘录，探讨在美国合作生产8英寸晶圆。【原文：Taiwan chip maker United Microelectronics Corp (UMC) said on Thursday it had signed a memorandum of understanding with U.S.-based Polar Semiconductor to explore collaboration on manufacturing of 8-inch wafers in the United States.】

item.title: 为英国运动员提供人工智能保护，防止网络辱骂
item.description: 英国体育协会（UK Sport）签署了一份 30 万英镑（约合 40.170 万美元）的协议，在社交媒体上提供基于人工智能的保护，英国顶尖运动员很快将拥有打击网络侵权的新武器。【原文：Top British athletes will soon have a new weapon in the fight against online abuse after UK Sport signed a 300,000 pound ($400,170.00) deal to provide AI-based protection across social media.】

item.title: ProShares 在美国证券交易委员会停止审查后撤回部分高杠杆 ETF 计划
item.description: ETF 提供商 ProShares 在收到美国证券监管机构的警告信后，撤回了一些高杠杆交易所交易基金的注册申请，该警告信指出了风险敞口，并暂停了对此类计划的审查。【原文：ETF provider ProShares has withdrawn its registration request for some highly leveraged exchange-traded funds after receiving a warning letter from the U.S. securities regulator that flagged risk exposures and paused the review of such plans.】

item.title: 英格兰银行启动私募股权和私人信贷行业压力测试
item.description: 英格兰银行周四表示，它正在启动一项压力测试，测试私募股权和私人信贷行业如何应对金融冲击。【原文：The Bank of England said on Thursday that it was launching a stress test of how the private equity and private credit industries would deal with a financial shock.】

item.title: 据《华盛顿邮报》报道，亚马逊探索切断与美国邮政的关系
item.description: 据《华盛顿邮报》周四援引三位知情人士的话报道，亚马逊正准备扩大其全国范围的快递网络，并放弃与美国邮政服务公司的长期合作关系。【原文：Amazon is preparing to expand its nationwide delivery network and give up its long-standing partnership with the U.S. Postal Service, the Washington Post reported on Thursday, citing three people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Meta 的 WhatsApp 人工智能政策陷入欧盟反垄断困境
item.description: 欧盟反垄断监管机构周四开始调查 Meta Platforms 有关人工智能供应商访问其消息服务 WhatsApp 的新政策，称这可能会阻碍竞争对手在欧洲提供服务。【原文：EU antitrust regulators opened on Thursday an investigation into Meta Platforms' new policy regarding AI providers' access to its messaging service WhatsApp, saying this may prevent rivals from offering their services in Europe.】

item.title: 力拓与中国中铝积极合作解决股权限制问题
item.description: 力拓首席执行官西蒙-特洛特（Simon Trott）周四表示，该矿商正积极与其主要股东中国铝业公司（Aluminium Corporation of China Limited，简称 "中铝"）合作，以解决限制该公司进行股票回购的治理制约因素。【原文：Rio Tinto CEO Simon Trott said on Thursday the miner is actively working with its main shareholder, Aluminium Corporation of China Limited (Chinalco), to resolve governance constraints that restrict the company's ability to conduct share buybacks.】

item.title: 瑞士手表因高端钟表需求旺盛，美国销售额激增 15
item.description: 本周四，奢侈品零售商瑞士钟表集团（Watches of Switzerland Group）发布报告称，受核心市场对高端钟表强劲需求的推动，该集团今年上半年在美国的销售额猛增 15%。【原文：Luxury retailer Watches of Switzerland Group reported a 15% jump in U.S. sales for the first half of the year on Thursday, boosted by strong demand for high-end timepieces in its core market.】

item.title: 台湾将禁用中国 "小红书 "应用一年，原因是担心存在欺诈行为
item.description: 台湾内政部周四表示，将暂停类似Instagram的中国社交媒体平台 "小红书 "的访问权限一年，理由是该平台存在安全风险，自2024年以来涉嫌参与了1700多起诈骗案件。【原文：Taiwan's interior ministry said on Thursday it would suspend access to Instagram-like Chinese social media platform Xiaohongshu for one year, citing security risks and its alleged involvement in over 1,700 fraud cases since 2024.】

item.title: 特朗普在燃油经济性规定上的 "大转弯 "提升了欧洲汽车制造商的股价
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提议削减其前任乔-拜登（Joe Biden）敲定的燃油经济性标准后，欧洲汽车制造商的股票在周四早盘交易中跳涨了2.5%至5%。【原文：Shares of European carmakers jumped between 2.5% and 5% in early Thursday trading after U.S. President Donald Trump proposed slashing fuel economy standards finalised by his predecessor Joe Biden.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称中国国有银行吸纳美元以减缓人民币涨势
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中国的主要国有银行本周在在岸即期市场上买入美元，并持有美元，以不同寻常的力度抑制人民币升值。【原文：China's major state-owned banks bought dollars in the onshore spot market this week and held on to them in an unusually strong effort to rein in yuan strength, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Palantir 与英伟达、CenterPoint Energy 合作开发软件，加速人工智能数据中心建设
item.description: Palantir Technologies、英伟达（Nvidia）和美国公用事业公司 CenterPoint Energy 周四表示，它们正在开发一个新的软件平台，以加速建设新的人工智能数据中心。【原文：Palantir Technologies , Nvidia and U.S. utility CenterPoint Energy on Thursday said they are developing a new software platform to accelerate the building of new artificial intelligence data centers.】

item.title: Meta 将因 Whatsapp 中使用人工智能而面临欧盟反垄断调查 - 消息来源
item.description: 一位消息人士告诉路透社，美国科技巨头 Meta 将面临欧盟对其聊天平台 Whatsapp 使用人工智能的反垄断调查。【原文：U.S. tech giant Meta is set to face a European Union antitrust investigation into use of artificial intelligence in its chat platform Whatsapp, a source told Reuters.】

item.title: 飞利浦股价下跌，管理层降低 2026 年增长预期
item.description: 飞利浦公司在一次会议上发表评论后，交易员对 2026 年的增长预期表示担忧，飞利浦股价周四下跌超过 5%。【原文：Philips shares fell more than 5% on Thursday after traders flagged concerns about 2026 growth expectations following comments from the Dutch health technology company at a conference.】

item.title: 英国电信为企业和公共部门推出主权数据平台
item.description: 英国电信公司周四为其公共部门和企业客户推出了一个主权数据平台，在国内存储和处理他们的数据，以满足日益增长的对更高复原力的需求。【原文：Britain's BT launched a sovereign data platform for its public-sector and business customers on Thursday to store and process their data in the country, responding to increasing demand for higher levels of resilience.】

item.title: 机构称俄罗斯对苹果 FaceTime 应用程序实施限制
item.description: 据俄罗斯通讯社周四报道，继政府限制 WhatsApp 和 Telegram 通话服务之后，俄罗斯又对苹果公司的视频通话应用程序 FaceTime 实施了限制。【原文：Russia has introduced restrictions against Apple's video-calling app FaceTime, widely used in the country after the government restricted WhatsApp and Telegram call services, Russian news agencies reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国表示正在简化稀土出口许可证程序
item.description: 中国周四表示，它正在努力简化稀土出口许可证--这是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与中国总统习近平会晤后承诺的一项重要成果。【原文：China said on Thursday it is working on streamlining rare earth export licenses - a key promised outcome after a meeting between U.S. President Donald Trump and his counterpart Xi Jinping.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称，Stellantis公司将因软件故障召回72,502辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周一援引一份提交给该监管机构的新闻稿称，克莱斯勒母公司斯特兰蒂斯公司（Stellantis）正在美国召回72509辆公羊汽车，原因是仪表板显示屏存在软件故障，导致显示屏出现空白。【原文：Chrysler parent Stellantis is recalling 72,509 Ram vehicles in the U.S. due to a software glitch in the instrument panel display that is causing it to go blank, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said, citing a release submitted to the regulator on Monday.】

item.title: 英国对未通过年龄检查的色情网站罚款 130 万美元
item.description: 英国周四对一家色情网站公司处以 100 万英镑（133 万美元）的罚款，原因是该公司没有进行严格的年龄检查以保护儿童，这是迄今为止英国在新的网络安全制度下处以的最大一笔罚款。【原文：Britain fined a porn website company 1 million pounds ($1.33 million) on Thursday for not having robust age checks in place to protect children, the biggest penalty to be imposed so far under its new online safety regime.】

item.title: 日本央行赢得了与高市的首次对决--接下来会发生什么就不那么确定了
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫利用外交手段，向首相佐那江隆一推销他的 12 月加息计划，并强调了通胀和日元疲软的危险，而佐那江隆一去年还称加息是愚蠢之举。【原文：Bank of Japan chief Kazuo Ueda used diplomacy and nodded to the dangers of inflation and a weak yen to sell his plan for a December rate hike to Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi, who only last year called rate hikes stupid.】

item.title: 消息人士称埃克森公司将从 3 月起永久关闭新加坡的一座蒸汽裂解装置
item.description: 四位知情人士透露，埃克森美孚计划从 3 月起关闭位于新加坡裕廊岛的两座蒸汽裂解装置中较早的一座的运营，这是全球石化行业在行业亏损的情况下削减产能趋势的一部分。【原文：ExxonMobil plans to wind down operations at the older of its two steam crackers on Singapore's Jurong Island from March, four sources familiar with the matter said, part of a global petrochemicals sector trend to reduce capacity amid industry losses.】

item.title: 奥尤陶勒盖扩产，力拓上调 2025 年铜产量预期
item.description: 力拓（Rio Tinto）周四上调了其 2025 年铜产量预期，理由是其位于蒙古的奥尤陶勒盖（Oyu Tolgoi）项目正在加速运营。【原文：Rio Tinto , upgraded its 2025 copper production forecast on Thursday, citing a ramp-up of operations at its Oyu Tolgoi project in Mongolia.】

item.title: 消息人士称，日本央行可能在 12 月加息，政府将容忍此举
item.description: 三位熟悉审议情况的政府消息人士称，日本央行很可能在 12 月加息，预计政府将容忍这一决定。【原文：The Bank of Japan is likely to raise interest rates in December with the government expected to tolerate such a decision, three government sources familiar with the deliberations said.】

item.title: 早间竞价美元贬值交易休息日
item.description: 格雷戈尔-斯图尔特-亨特对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Gregor Stuart Hunter】

item.title: 宜家在新西兰开设距离瑞典最远的分店
item.description: 宜家家居周四在新西兰开设了第一家分店，这是它进入的第 64 个市场，也是这家家具零售商离开瑞典本土最远的前哨站。【原文：IKEA opened its first store in New Zealand on Thursday, entering its 64th market and marking the furniture retailer's most distant outpost from its native Sweden.】
